text: Tucker Swanson McNear Carlson (born May 16, 1969) is an American television host and conservative political commentator who hosted on Fox News from 2016 to 2023. He is a contributing editor for The Weekly Standard. He started his television career as a political analyst for the Cable News Network (CNN) and also a host on that network, co-hosting The Spin Room and Crossfire. He left CNN in 2004. He then started hosting a show on MSNBC.http://www.foxnews.com/on-air/personalities/tucker-carlson/bio/#s=a-d Carlson co-founded The Daily Caller, funded by Foster Friess. He then co- hosted a weekend morning talk show on Fox News Channel. http://www.foxnews.com/on-air/personalities/tucker-carlson/bio/ On April 24, 2023, he was fired from Fox News. Tucker was born in San Francisco and grew up in Carlsbad, California. In 2006, he was a contestant on Dancing with the Stars. He was the first person eliminated from the competition. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American political commentators Category:Dancing with the Stars participants Category:Journalists from California Category:People from San Diego County, California Category:Writers from San Francisco Category:Television personalities from California Category:Republicans (United States) Category:People with dyslexia
title: Tucker Carlson
